NPC.name: Awari
NPC.description: This long haired and redheaded emerald elf is clad in a skirt like the others but assesses you with a more confident smirk than most others. And such may be justified as she carries with her a wooden fighting staff and her bared breasts are adorned with a fierce looking necklace of teeth or possibly claws.

missText.text: Awari's strike fails to connect with TARGET

hitText.text: Awari strikes TARGET for VALUE points of damage
